project.name: The Well of Mimir Rune Cards
project.description: A modern, inclusive interpretation of the Elder Futhark in a deck of 24 cards plus booklet

creator.name: Angela Raincatcher
creator.biography: I am a nature writer, spirit-led artist, and Pagan priestess living and working in the Washington-Baltimore metro area.

titre: The Well of Mimir holds all of human experience.
texte: Nestled within the roots of Yggsdrasil, the World Tree, the well of Mimir is the wellspring of memory, inspiration, and knowledge. It holds the eye of Odin, pledged in sacrifice for cosmic wisdom and the secrets of the runes.
But the runes are not just a quaint relic of the distant past. Nor are they, in essence, the property of modern neo-fascists or white supremacists.

The runes are the building blocks of language in Northern Europe. And language is magical ‚Äì it‚Äôs how humans explain and describe their world, it‚Äôs how we communicate with each other and the gods, it‚Äôs how we give shape to our experiences. The runes, like the letters, symbols, and words of many pre-Christian languages, hold within them the memory, inspiration, and wisdom of the Ancestors.
We can use the runes to help us understand our experience in this world and to peel back the veils that obscure our clear seeing.
The runes speak to human experience‚Äîpast, present, and future
The Well of Mimir Rune Card Deck contains 24 cards, each representing one letter within the Elder Futhark; plus a full-color, 36-page instruction booklet.
Each card displays the rune, along with artwork created by spirit-led artist Angela Raincatcher to illustrate a central concept of the rune.
Higher levels of support include additions, such as:

Consciously Pagan and polytheist since the late 1980s, Angela Raincatcher has been a priestess, community organizer, and spirit-led artist since the early 2000s. She is a third-degree initiate in The Order of Elemental Mysteries at Two Rivers Sanctuary, the dean of students for Reflections Mystery School, the creator of the North American Animal Wisdom Oracle, and the host of the Polytheism Today podcast.

Angela is a spirit-led visual artist. Her canvas and studio are the crossroads and sacred circle where the physical meets the spiritual to create manifest forms of beauty, healing, and transformation. Angela learns new systems and connects with the gods through study, trance, and making art. This deck is the expression of her work to understand the Elder Futhark runes as spiritual symbols for magick, meditation, and divination.

Any funds raised by this Kickstarter above the amount needed to fulfill supporter rewards will be used to pay for Angela Raincatcher's participation in Going with Grace's Death Doula training, which will provide the skills and knowledge about end-of-life options and transition presence for Angela to serve the polytheist, pagan, and progressive communities in the Washington-Baltimore area.

project.name: Ordinary People: A Paper Theatre Series
project.description: fund some NEW hand-painted paper sculptures celebrating the power of ordinary people to rescue what we love & resist authoritarianism

creator.name: Bryana Joy Beaird
creator.biography: I'm a traditional watercolor artist based in Allentown, PA. I enjoy incorporating elements of both the whimsical & the surreal in my heavily-detailed paintings & hand-cut paper dioramas. My work is driven by the power of emotive visual storytelling to broaden the capacity of the human mind by stimulating empathy.

texte: Please note that all photos shown in this campaign description are photos of my past work on similar projects, not photos of the project in question. This campaign seeks funding for a brand-new project in the spirit of my past work. These photos of completed projects are shown to give backers an idea of the kind of work their pledges will fund.

In the tempestuous early days of 2025, I made three original paper theatre scenes to carry some of my strongest feelings about the power of ordinary people to rescue what we love and to resist authoritarianism. Two of those pieces‚Äî"Keep A Light On" and "Ice Won't Win"‚Äîare shown in the featured image in the banner for this campaign.

In 2026, I want to make more pieces in this same spirit and exhibit them together as a set. The number I'm able to make will be determined by the success of this campaign. I'll proceed even if I can only make one, but it is my hope that this Kickstarter will be able to fund the creation of at least three entirely new pieces. See the "Funding Structure and Stretch Goals" section for more information about this.

In addition to the original pieces I'm hoping to create, I plan to scan each separate layer of these paper theatres and thread them together digitally to fashion a flat image version that can be sent digitally to backers at the "Digital Print Supporter" tier, and can be professionally-printed and mailed to backers at the "Fine Art Print Supporter" tier and above. This is a time-consuming process I couldn't afford to tackle with my previous paper theatres, but upfront funding can make it a possibility now.

The Form
The tunnel books I created in 2025 were some of the most precious things I brought with me out of a very difficult year. In each place I have displayed them (both online and at in-person events) they have elicited strong and sometimes emotional reactions. For me, they have been what art can be at its very best: a vehicle that facilitates connection between human souls. During a disheartening era where AI-generated material is poisoning people's ability to trust and enjoy art, these clearly-analog pieces responding to the current moment have been one of the primary things keeping me excited about creating. I want to do more work in this form because I believe it engages audiences effectively and encourages other to participate in creative work.

The Content 
In our time, values that once felt too elementary to make a hullabaloo about seem suddenly to be in dire need of a spirited defense. Similarly, coarse, mean-spirited attitudes that were once dismissed as cringe and fringe are being lauded in high places. I believe it is of urgent importance that Ordinary People push back against these trends and reaffirm in every way we know how that we have no intention of abandoning the core ethical principles that undergird a civil society: honest dealings, generosity of heart, support for humanitarian institutions, a spirit of welcome towards people fleeing violence, an ethic rooted in sharing rather than in hoarding, a determination to tackle problems collaboratively, and an avoidance of competitive bluster towards neighbors and allies.

While I regularly donate to causes I believe in and participate in protests and visibility events, the arts always feel like my truest form of expression, and I want to do more creative work that responds to our times with imagery that is also timeless.

"No one is coming to save us" people were saying in the dark days of early 2025 when the current U.S. administration took sudden aim at global alliances, refugee communities, crucial life-saving aid funding, public lands, free speech, democracy, the concept of empathy, and truth itself in a cascade of aggressive actions. 

And I thought, without knowing whether it would prove true, "We. We are coming to save us."

It's 2026 now. Our democracy is still under assault and we have been living through the nightmare of an active constitutional crisis for well over a year. But in the midst of all this, someone has been coming through and it's no one you've heard of. It's not a film star or a CEO or a senate minority leader. It's just this: ordinary people.
All year long, ordinary people have been showing up to show care and support for their struggling communities and imperiled neighbors.
Showing up to show a spirit of resistance towards the hardhearted cruelty and rampant lawlessness presently on display in the halls of power.
Showing that rescue and resistance are often two sides of the very same coin.

Ordinary people have been organizing food drives, fundraisers, and charity auctions to counter the worst affects of irresponsible funding cuts. Ordinary people have been giving up their time off to flock to protests by the millions. Ordinary people have stood outdoors in blowing snow and blazing heat to hold signs demanding moral courage from elected leaders. Ordinary people have been speaking up in public forums fully aware that using their voices may cost them friendships and business opportunities. Ordinary people have poured countless hours into vetting information in a disinformation hellscape, curating resources for their communities, and expressing resistance in poetry, painting, and song.
We may feel small in the scheme of things, but there are so, so many of us. When each of us is doing the thing we know how to do, Ordinary People are a force that won't be easily stopped.

These "tunnel book" paper theatre scenes are complex and extremely time-consuming to design and create. It typically takes me a full work week to make one, and handmade pieces that require this level of time and attention seldom sell for anything close to a living wage. Tackling this kind of project is thus a major financial commitment, and it keeps me away from work that can more reliably pay my bills. I've been dreaming about expanding this paper theatre series for over six months now, but have been kept away from it for financial reasons. Getting some upfront funding for this series via Kickstarter will allow me to take the necessary time away from gig work to make what is on my soul while the time is right.

Of course, depending on which support tier backers gravitate towards, the majority of the funds raised in this campaign will likely go directly towards printing, packaging, and shipping the little art prints that capture the new paper theatre scene(s) I create.

Initial Goal: $600
If this project meets the initial pledge goal, it will be funded and go ahead! This means I will create one new paper theatre scene exploring the Ordinary People theme outlined in the "Why Ordinary People?" section above. 

Basic Supporters will receive access to a behind-the-scenes post sharing details and photos from the creation process for the new piece.

Digital Print Supporters will receive a printable file containing a flat image aggregating all the scanned layers of the paper theatre. 

Fine Art Print Supporters (and higher) will receive one miniature fine art print featuring a professionally-printed flat image version of the new paper theatre scene.

Stretch Goal No. 1: $1200
If this project meets its first stretch goal of $1200, I'll create TWO new paper theatre scenes exploring the Ordinary People theme.

Basic Supporters will receive access to two behind-the-scenes posts sharing details and photos from the creation process for both new pieces.  

Digital Print Supporters will receive a printable file containing two flat images aggregating all the scanned layers of the two new paper theatres.
Fine Art Print Supporters (and higher) will receive two miniature fine art prints featuring professionally-printed flat image versions of the two new paper theatre scenes.

Stretch Goal No. 2: $1800
If this project meets its second stretch goal of $1800, I'll create THREE new paper theatre scenes exploring the Ordinary People theme. 

Basic Supporters will receive access to three behind-the-scenes posts sharing details and photos from the creation process for all three new pieces.

Digital Print Supporters will receive a printable file containing three flat images aggregating all the scanned layers of the three new paper theatres. 

Fine Art Print Supporters (and higher) will be given the opportunity to pick which two of the three new paper theatre scenes they would like to receive as miniature fine art prints. 

If enough time still remains on the funding campaign at that point, a new stretch goal may also be unlocked!

The prints will be professionally printed on heavy cotton paper. They will be small (under 5x7 inches in size) since the original paper theatre scenes are miniatures. This pledge amount includes free shipping to United States addresses.

project.name: Yip Yap Shenanigans
project.description: A set of enamel pins featuring kobolds and one perfectly normal gentleman

creator.name: Grumpy Gryphon
creator.biography:
I'm a lvl 37 Dutchie, living in the UK these days, who loves to design and create fantasy merchandise.

I have been notified that there are scammers going around impersonating me. Please be aware that this is my only Kickstarter account! I will never offer a campaign manager of any sort, I only run my own campaigns!

texte: Of course more kobold pins! It's been a hot minute since I made some... so it's about time we make some new ones and a couple of new stickers while we're at it!
I can't do it without your help however so I hope you'll join us to create another pack!
We ship worldwide with the exception of Germany (sorry!) - any German pledges will be cancelled.
As a reminder: you won't be charged until the campaign is finished (if successfully funded!). After this you will receive a survey that allows you to choose which enamel pin(s) you'd like to receive.
The pins in this campaign feature 4 new kobold friends and 1 very normal moustachioed gentleman who for some reason is hanging around this pack of troublemakers.
Because the moustachioed gentleman is so tall they're a little bit more expensive than the kobold friends and are a separate item reward. Make certain to check which rewards you pledge for.
All these pins will be hard enamel with black nickel plating.
As always these stickers are waterproof and outdoor friendly so you can take these single-brain-cell-sharing creatures on many adventures... should you like.

Due to how well the campaign is doing we have created an additional sticker design - please note that 'Jingle Jingle' is only available via the add-ons and is not part of any pledges so you will have to manually grab it.
We're UK based and will ship worldwide EXCEPT for Germany (we unfortunately are unable to comply with Germany's LUCID compliance at this point in time).

While you'll be able to see the exact shipping when you pledge I've added an overview of shipping estimated below. Please note that the UK will have flat rates, the rest of the world will depend on how many items your reward tier includes.
The default shipping method is untracked and with 25 GBP of insurance. You can add tracking by selecting this as an add-on, tracking also comes with an insurance cover of 250 GBP.
If your package gets lost in transit we will only refund/replace up to the amount it was insured for.

UK 
Flat rate for all order sizes
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 2 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 4 GBP

United States 
1 - 4 pins/stickers only
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 7 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 13 GBP

5 pins or more
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 12 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 18 GBP

New Zealand and Australia
1 - 4 pins/stickers only
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 7 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 13 GBP

5 pins or more
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 12 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 18 GBP

Europe/Rest of the World
1 - 4 pins/stickers only
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 6 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 12 GBP

5 pins or more
Untracked (25 GBP insurance): 10 GBP
Tracked (250 GBP insurance): 16 GBP

For US Backers

We ship everything to the US with Delivery Duties Paid.

Last year the US removed the de minimis and imposed tariffs on all imported products. To give you peace of mind we will be shipping all the rewards headed for the US with all tariffs and duties pre-paid (these costs are rolled into the price of your shipping estimate already) meaning you shouldn't have to pay anything extra! 

This said, your current legislation has a habit of changing things up out of nowhere with little to no prior announcement so it is possible things may change between now and when the rewards are shipped. Should this happen we will be in touch with everyone affected and discuss how to approach these changes.
For all other non UK Backers

Please be aware that for legal reasons we are required to declare the purchase price of the item on the delivery documents for any pledges outside of the UK. We have no control over any import charges that may be applied by individual countries.

By backing this campaign you agree that you are aware that you are responsible for any VAT and other additional customs charged by your country. We will not refund any items returned to me due to unpaid customs duties or incomplete/incorrect addresses.
If everything goes smoothly the production timeline is estimated to look like the following:
This may sound like a long turnaround but I prefer to be realistic with how long these things can take.

I'm Dee, also known as Eltha or Grumpy Gryphon. I'm a 37 years old queer freelance artist and merch designer who specialises in pin design and production. I absolutely love kobolds (as may be evident from recent projects) and making merch of them brings me incredible joy!
If you would like to see more of my work you can check out my carrd which will link you to my website and all the social media platforms I'm active on.

project.name: Gallery/Print shop & studio "Mezzanine"
project.description: An gallery/print shop aiming to give young up and coming artists a place to create and exhibit their art, allowing them to be seen.

creator.name: Sasha Mingasson
creator.biography: Young franco-bosnian emerging visual artist, born in France and currently based in Sarajevo. Briefly studied at the Academy of Fine arts of Sarajevo and in Paris, studying history at Sorbonne.

texte: Sarajevo, between the 50s and the end of the 20th century, had a central place in the artistic and cultural scene of the Balkans. A city that promoted the creation of art, where artist were close to their public, their work accessible and important to society, cultural centres were thriving, concerts, exhibitions and plays were the constantly happening, and visited in high numbers. Following the war of 1992, Sarajevo struggled to rebuild this cultural fervour, artists were no longer receiving the means to create and promote their work, places that were once dedicated to that effort, mostly public establishments, were either given new functions or left to abandonment.

Today, Sarajevo is a city where culture and art clearly still hold the same importance it once did, but most artists eventually bump into the wall that is the lack of a space to show their work, to make it exist in society. It is now difficult for artists, particularly young emerging artists, to get the exposure and remuneration they need, not only making a career in art very difficult, which in turn makes their work difficult for the public to access and appreciate their work.

The spirit and potential that fuelled the once thriving cultural and artistic scene of Sarajevo is still there, it however suffers from a lack of support and opportunities to express itself, the same can be said for the whole region.

I am Sasha Mingasson, one of the young aforementioned emerging artists, during a brief period in the academy of fine arts of Sarajevo, I have met many young talented artists, full of ambitions, ideas and most importantly, with the will to contribute to the reconstruction of the local artistic scene. What they are lacking the most, is an outlet and the finances (or a prospect of remuneration), without which no artistic project can come to realisation, nor is a career in art feasible. It is because of this lack of prospect that lots of people with a passion and talent for art end up looking for a career elsewhere, which often, leads to a great and dangerous loss of authentic regional culture and art.

It isn't for a lack of interest in art, because of an apathy and disinterest in culture that the situation is as it is, the few cultural events that do take place, such as the SFF (Sarajevo film festival), Jazz Fest, or exhibitions in the national gallery, are all visited in high numbers and are something that locals are proud of. These are things that are highly sought after, the only problem is the lack of funding, initiatives and spaces dedicated to art.

In this in response to these difficulties, with the ambition to give these young emerging artists a voice and a presence in society, that i am opening Mezzanine. A space for this generation of artists to express themselves, to give them the public they need.

Mezzanine is a multi-functional space, it will be a gallery that also functions as a print shop, with a small screen printing studio on the floor. Every month a different artist will use the exhibition space to exhibit his works, as of right now there are three artists in line, Ryan O'Hara (@Zlo_u_potrebi), BOTCH (no.xylene) and Tristan Berthoud (@Obscutrist). That space will also be used to display a catalogue of prints (mostly screen printed and giclee prints) from young artists of the region as well as to exhibit some of my works.

The silk-screen printing studio will allow ‚ÄúMezzanine‚Äù to have its own in-house production of screen printed prints, and give those artists the opportunity to print series of their works. It will also be used to print on hoodies and shirts, creating a collection of clothes with artworks by young local artists, not only turning their art into something wearable, but is also one of the best ways to get their works to be seen and talked about.
The studio will also function as the economical backbone of the gallery, by offering screen printing services to businesses, a sort of an financial safety net.
To make this project a reality, i need your help shouldering the initial costs. To give a second life to the space, and to acquire the material to set the studio up.
The funds would go in the following :

all available works for postcards and prints will be communicated to backers at the end of the campaign.  They will either be works of Sasha Mingasson or Tristan Berthoud, the choice is yours to make.

project.name: Real Heavy Metal - Metallic Paints by Ionic Smart Colors
project.description: 60 new true metallic metal paints for miniature painting, divided into easy-to-use sets of base, metallic wash, and highlight.

creator.name: Ammo by Mig Jimenez
creator.biography: AMMO by Mig Jimenez and Ionic Smart Colors

titre: Three Steps to Master Real Heavy Metal
texte: AMMO by Mig Jimenez is a well-known name in the scale modeling world. Our team brings over two decades of experience in developing practical modeling solutions for hobbyists, built on the shared knowledge of modelers across many genres and from all around the world.

A little over a year ago, we introduced Ionic Smart Colors, a new line created to support wargamers, tabletop gamers, and figure painters with that same experience and a shared passion. Thanks to your support, this new line, representing a new space for us, has continued to grow and evolve. We are truly grateful to the community for welcoming Ionic Smart Colors so warmly.

Your feedback has always guided our work, and we‚Äôve always listened. After many requests for more metallic colors, we‚Äôre excited to introduce the newest addition to Ionic: the Real Heavy Metal range...

Real Heavy Metal has been designed to provide hobbyists with all the metallics they could need for any project, from the classic silvers and golds, to metallics reds, blues, and more, with the same strengths and quality they are used to from Ionic. Featuring 60 new water-based acrylic paints in total, each color is manufactured with intense metallic pigments.

Each color is part of a set which provides an easy-to-use 3-Step Smart System for painting true metallic metals consisting of a base, metallic wash, and highlight. This system can be applied in order: base > metallic wash > highlight or varied based on personal preference, such as base > highlight > metallic wash. 

Thanks to its simplicity, this system can be used by painters of any experience level, whether you are a beginner painting your first army, or an experienced painter applying the metallic tones to your latest display piece. Real Heavy Metal is versatile and can adapt to any technique or method of application, be it brush, airbrush, drybrush, glazing, layering and more....

The process of basecoat, wash, and highlight is a common methodology in any modeler's arsenal. However, because washes are typically matte, they can dull metallic finishes. Even glossy washes that preserve shine often reduce the metallic character of the pigments.

Real Heavy Metal uses Metallic Washes made from darkened versions of the same metallic pigments found in the base and highlight colors, helping preserve the metallic sheen of your paintwork throughout the entire process. Painting True Metallic Metals has never been more metal!

The Real Heavy Metal Metallic Washes are also highlighy pigmented. When used over metallics, this preserves the saturation and sheen of the metallic base color. However, when applied over a light color, such as white, they create shading and highlights with a single bushstroke. As you can see on the below example:

We've designed this campaign to be as straight forward as possible, with three pledge levels that each provide tiered discounts. We may add more levels based on feedback and any stretch goals that unlock. As a thank you for supporting our Kickstarter, each pledge includes an exclusive discount, while larger pledges include free miniatures. 

Additional items can be added to your pledge at the cost outlined in the Add-Ons section. Add-ons are easily added to a pledge by simply increasing the amount pledged, by the price of the add-on. For example, if you want to add an additional paint set to the "Metal Warrior" pledge, you would pledge a total of ‚Ç¨20, ‚Ç¨10 for the initial pledge, and ‚Ç¨10 for the add-on.

Metal Warrior - Any single set of your choice, at a special Kickstarter discount!
Kickstarter Price: ‚Ç¨10  RRP: ‚Ç¨10.70  Discount: 6.5%

Metal Hero - Five sets of your choice, at a special Kickstarter discount!
Kickstarter Price: ‚Ç¨47  RRP: ‚Ç¨53.50  Discount: 12%

Master of Metal - Ten sets of your choice, at a special Kickstarter discount! Plus a free figure from a choice of two dwarfs. 
Kickstarter Price: ‚Ç¨91  RRP: ‚Ç¨107  Discount: 14.9% with a completely FREE figure!
Included Stretch Goals: A free A.MIG Synthetic Brush supplied at random.

King of Metal - All twenty sets plus two completely free figures! 
Kickstarter Price: ‚Ç¨171  RRP: ‚Ç¨214  Discount: 20% with two completely FREE figures! 
Included Stretch Goals: A free A.MIG Synthetic Brush supplied at random.

The Master of Metal pledge includes one free miniature, from a choice of two, and the King of Metal pledge includes both free miniatures. These figures were made in collaboration with Hollow Crown Miniatures, and were sculpted by Florian Wortmann. They are cast in high-quality resin, they are not 3D prints. Both figures are 28mm heroic scale and include a round 25mm plastic base. They are the perfect opportunity to test out your new Real Heavy Metal paints!

Add-ons are easily added to a pledge by simply increasing the amount pledged, by the price of the add-on. For example, if you want to add an additional Fantasy Dwarf to the "Master of Metal" pledge, you would pledge a total of ‚Ç¨102, ‚Ç¨91 for the initial pledge, and ‚Ç¨11 for the Fantasy Dwarf add-on. 

You can add as many stretch goals as you would like, please feel free to reach out if you have any difficulties at all! You can see a full list of add-ons below, which we will update as new stretch goals become available.

As our campaign progresses, we want to reward your support with additional items, including free gifts and exclusive discounts. You can see Stretch Goals below, we will add more as they become available, so stay tuned!

Real Heavy Metal is a complete solution for painting true metallic metals, offering a wide chromatic range to explore. Its simple basecoat, metallic wash, and highlight system keeps it accessible, while more experienced painters can mix tones and techniques to unlock even greater possibilities. Discover the full range below.

Real Heavy Metal features an exclusive formulation, combining the  features of Ionic Smart Colors with realistic and easy-to-use metallic pigments of the highest quality. We have worked hard over the last twelve months to create a paint that is:

Ideal for brush and airbrush use: No matter how you like to paint, Real Heavy Metal can be used with your preferred method of application. Straight from the bottle with a brush, and with a small amount of Ionic Thinner for airbrush.

With strong covering power and self-leveling properties: Even light tones cover black primer with ease, using both brush or airbrush. Thanks to its self-leveling properties, even heavy or uneven applications preserve the fine details of your miniatures.

Self-moisturizing and easy to mix: as a water-based acrylic, Real Heavy Metal tones are easily mixed with each other, and the original Ionic Smart Colors range, providing endless possibilities. Thanks to their self-moisturizing qualities, they remain wet and workable for longer.

Compatible with any technique: Real Heavy Metal had been designed to adapt to your favourite technique, not the other way around. Thanks to their durability, Real Heavy Metal paints can be used alongside masking and weathering products. Perfect for both beginner and experienced modelers, they can be applied with airbrush, layering, wet-blending, drybrushing... and any method you can think of!

Suitable for any theme or scale: the wide chromatic range in the Real Heavy Metal line ensures you always have the correct metallic color to hand, whether you are painting a sci-fi dwarf, a fantastical warrior, or a historical soldier. Whilst its fine pigment means it can be used with miniatures of any size.

With a metal mixing ball for the perfect consistency every time: every bottle of Real Heavy Metal contains a metal mixing ball ensuring all components within the paint are mixed perfectly with just a quick shake.

With the Ionic Smart Lid and Bottle: the Real Heavy Metal range uses the same bottles as other Ionic Smart Colors. A perfectly transparent and flexible bottle, ensures you always know the exact color inside, while its flexibility makes it easy to deposit the right amount of paint. The lid is easily opened and closed with one hand, without the need for unscrewing, and prevents spills or mess.

Each bottle contains 20ml of paint, ideal for large projects and demanding painters. Despite its larger quantity, the bottles are the same diameter as the smaller, commonly used 16 and 17ml bottles. This means they fit on your racks and storage solutions without issue.

When we released Ionic Smart Colors, we were truly blown away by the response. After four years of development, it was incredibly rewarding to see how warmly the community received the Ionic formulation. At the same time, we heard a great deal of feedback that the range needed more metallic tones.

With that in mind, we‚Äôve spent the past year developing Real Heavy Metal, and it‚Äôs now ready for release. We chose Kickstarter for this launch because it allows us to ensure hobbyists around the world receive their paints at the same time, while also giving us the opportunity to offer a special discount. We believe this is the fairest way to say thank you for the loyalty and support that has helped shape and grow Ionic. It also allows us to gauge demand so that no body is left waiting for a second production run.

Shipping costs will be collected after the Kickstarter campaign ends. Once the campaign has concluded, we will contact all backers with a code for the pledge manager on our webstore. At that point, you will be able to select the specific sets and add-ons you would like. The webstore will calculate shipping options and costs based on the total weight and size of your pledge. We will then begin fulfilling your order.

Pledges can be increased and add-ons added up until the time you pay for shipping. Our goal is to complete fulfillment by the end of September 2026, although we will work hard to deliver your paints sooner. Production is ready to begin immediately, and the formulation has already been finalized.

All items will ship from our warehouse in Spain, from which we ship orders worldwide on a daily basis. Please note that backers may be responsible for customs duties, VAT, and other applicable import fees such as Tariffs. We please ask that you are aware of any such costs in your locality. Estimated shipping costs can be found on our webstore, by clicking here.
Below you can watch videos made using the Real Heavy Metal paints, we will update this list as more videos become available.
Our team have already been putting the Real Heavy Metal range to work on their project, below you can see examples from their recent projects.

project.name: Journey to Harper Homestead Pottery
project.description: This is my dream, forged in clay, for my studio business. Located in Michigan, I will combine my love for nature with handmade pottery.

creator.name: sarahthepotter
creator.biography: My name is Sarah Holroyd. I am currently a full time studio assistant for Grayling Ceramics in Kalamazoo, Michigan. The next step in my Ceramic Arts journey is to open my own studio business, which I plan to do on my homestead property near Gun Lake. My dream is to produce functional ware that combines my affinity to nature with my love of wheel thrown forms.

texte: The dream to become a small production potter is something I have possessed since high school. After acquiring my Fine Arts degree from Siena Heights University, I spent a decade without ceramics in my life at all. I never lost hope for my dream, and pressed on through jobs that weren‚Äôt my calling. A few years ago, I was given the opportunity to work as a studio assistant for Grayling Ceramics, owned by Shay and Maura Church. Grayling also got its start with the help of Kickstarter. Shay and Maura have provided me with the chance to hone my skills, and learn a great deal about how a small business operates. Harper Homestead Pottery will feature hand made wheel thrown ware that focuses on both function and details influenced by the natural world. While my business will be starting in my home, I do have a future goal to open a brick and mortar studio once I‚Äôve grown the business. If my funds goal can be reached, I will finish out my basement studio, launch my website and business, and begin producing ware on a regular basis. I plan on continuing with my career at Grayling for now, until my business grows enough for me to go out on my own. I am excited to share my creative works with the world!

project.name: The Crystal Doorway Tarot Deck
project.description: The Crystal Doorway Tarot is a deck of digital collages, intentionally created to reimagine & honor the traditions of tarot.

creator.name: Kaeleigh McHenry
creator.biography:
I am a spiritual healer and psychic. I created a program called Soul Alchemy, which combines NLP practices and intuitive guidance to help you connect to your own intuition and spirituality to transmute and release the belief systems that keep you from living the life you desire!

I also offer phone or in person tarot and oracle card readings! ÔøΩ

texte: Tarot cards have been used for eons to provide clarity around what feels overwhelmingly confusing, to confirm those little niggling feelings you have in your gut and can't quite place, or to provide a comforting cosmic squeeze to assure you that you are not alone.
When you are standing at the threshold of your destiny, the cards can show you how to cross it.
They are the Cosmic Translator - giving you the language to explain the feelings, fragmented thoughts, or physical sensations you experience when you are channeling divine guidance.
And the symbols, artwork, colors, and composition of each card is what makes the language clear and concise.
It is crucial to use a deck that you connect with visually, because that is what will make your messages come through, crystal clear.
And that is why the Crystal Doorway Tarot was created.

I wanted to reimagine the classic symbolism of the Rider-Waite-Smith deck in a way that will draw you in with its beauty and give you so many ways to clearly interpret what your intuition is trying to say.

The digital collage art form allowed me to intuitively choose and layer exactly the right images to convey the traditional meanings of each card. And within those images, there are always going to be hidden details that reveal themselves only when necessary, allowing you to have a truly unique reading experience every single time.
This deck consists of 78 full-color cards, with gold gilded edges.

The card back design is unique for a tarot deck - the image is NOT the same whether the cards are upright or reversed! Honestly, I personally don't read reversals, so it didn't feel important to create the backs in a more traditional style.
You will have the full Major Arcana and the four suits - Cups, Wands, Swords, and Pentacles.

There will also be a guidebook to inspire your intuition, not to lead it. Through more of a story-telling style you will be given a little insight to the meanings of each card but I always encourage you to listen to your own intuition before leaning on the guidebook for the answers!
It is also important for me to say that this is not just another deck of pretty images.

You will feel the emotions of the people and animals depicted on each card, through their facial expressions or body language. Your eyes will be drawn to the light flares and the colors and the tiniest details. And you will see images or symbols synchronized across various cards.
All of these components were intentionally crafted to give you endless layers to peel back. Endless ways to interpret a card or combination of cards based on the context of the reading you are doing.

This deck was created so that you can learn to trust your intuitive nudges based on the emotional hits you get when you see each card. To teach you how to translate the story that is trying to be told.
This is the perfect deck for beginners and seasoned readers alike, and EVERYONE will see something different when they are pulling their cards. That is the magick of this deck.
The Crystal Doorway is open - are you going to step through and see what clarity you find on the other side?

project.name: The Crimson Elixir
project.description: A Mythical Cinematic Augmentation of the 5e Experience

creator.name: Clay Cyanide
creator.biography:
Clay Cyanide stands as a premium force in digital sculpting and tabletop design, where every release is forged with obsessive craftsmanship and cinematic vision. For over a decade, we've built an unshakeable reputation among collectors, painters, and gamers worldwide by delivering museum-grade STL files that don't just print‚Äîthey tell stories.
Our philosophy is uncompromising: cinematic detail that captures drama in every pose, dynamic storytelling that breathes life into myth and legend, and unmatched printability engineered for flawless results on resin or FDM‚Äîwhether destined for display cases, wargaming tables, or immersive narrative campaigns.

From dark mythologies and reimagined legends (Eldritch Echoes, Fall of Atlantis, Wrath of God) to bold original universes like Starseed: War of the Ancients, we set new standards in creativity, execution, and emotional impact. Each collection is masterfully supported, rigorously tested, and ready to elevate your tabletop experience.

With thousands of loyal patrons, over 900 models released, and a legacy trusted across Patreon, MyMiniFactory, and beyond, Clay Cyanide has become synonymous with quality, artistry, and relentless innovation.

This is more than minis.
This is the next chapter in tabletop legendry.
Welcome to Clay Cyanide.

titre: What You Get at Base Goal ($8,888 Funded)
Why This Project Exists ‚Äì Join the Awakening
texte: Higher tiers add VIP live collaboration sessions, variant audio, and named credits.

The Crimson Elixir is not just lore ‚Äî it is an interactive cinematic encounter designed for modern tabletop play. Players enter a rediscovered Atlantean ruin where: Reality subtly behaves incorrectly, Ancient guardians still follow forgotten commands, Sigils react to presence, and something deep below is beginning to awaken again

This first chapter ‚Äî Act I: The Inner Sanctum ‚Äî serves as the opening arc of a larger unfolding mythos. Future expansions will explore new ruins, deeper truths behind the Elixir, and the consequences of whatever choices players make here. Nothing in Atlantis ended cleanly. And nothing that awakens here will remain contained forever.

This project was designed from the ground up for modern hybrid tabletop play. Instead of overwhelming Game Masters with dense rulebooks, we focused on tools that make encounters immersive and fast to run: High-detail STL miniatures for printing or digital use VTT-ready maps compatible with Foundry, Roll20, and Alchemy Encounter overlays, tokens, and environmental assets Modular DM Command Deck cheat systems Narrative hooks for different character archetypes Community-forged playtesting for balanced final stats Everything is structured to help Game Masters focus on storytelling rather than preparation fatigue.

This is just a sample Cover of the LOREBOOK. Final Output will vary and be finalized on the FINAL CANON version. Though, what we have in mind is a rugged and old-looking book, if ever we can move forward to Phase 2, which is the Physical Copy.
The Design is not the final Stat Block design, but just a sample. It does not represent the final output for VTT and Printable Asset
Starting Day 1 of the campaign, we‚Äôll begin revealing the core 12 playable starting characters ‚Äî the heroes designed to drop immediately into the Crimson Elixir encounter system.
But here‚Äôs the important part: Those 12 characters are only the beginning.

Already included in the base campaign are: ‚úÖ 12 Core Starting Characters ‚úÖ 26+ Additional Characters (Funding Goal Content) That means 38+ characters minimum are already planned within the base campaign before any stretch goals unlock.

Why Daily Reveals? This reveal schedule is designed to: Keep the campaign exciting every single day Showcase each character properly instead of dumping everything at once Let backers absorb the lore, design, and gameplay value gradually Build community speculation and discussion, and highlight the scale of what‚Äôs already included These reveals happen regardless of funding milestones. They are part of the core campaign ‚Äî not stretch goals.

What Each Character Reveal Includes: Every revealed character isn‚Äôt just a model. You‚Äôll receive: STL miniature (print-ready versions), VTT token assets, Stat block integration, Lore entry or narrative context, Gameplay compatibility with the encounter system, and Printable support materials where applicable. Some characters serve as player options. Others function as NPCs, enemies, or story catalysts. All are usable within the system.

You‚Äôre not waiting to see if the campaign becomes substantial. It already is. Daily reveals just let you experience it piece by piece. And yes ‚Äî there‚Äôs still more beyond what‚Äôs currently planned.

We‚Äôre building this campaign like a living story, not a content dump. That means stretch goals won‚Äôt all be revealed at once. Instead, they will unlock gradually throughout the campaign ‚Äî keeping momentum high, preserving discovery, and letting the world unfold in a cinematic way. This approach ensures: Continuous excitement during the campaign, Clear focus on each new unlock, Better community engagement, Time to properly showcase each addition, A stronger narrative build rather than random extras, You‚Äôre not just funding add-ons. You‚Äôre unlocking chapters of a growing universe.

Each arc expands the experience in three stages: 

‚ë† Boss Encounter Unlock The first unlock of each arc introduces a signature boss tied directly to that region of the story. These include: Detailed STL miniature Printable and VTT tokens Full stat block and encounter design Phase mechanics and cinematic triggers Lore integration Encounter cards for fast DM use Audio stingers or boss theme elements These bosses are designed to feel meaningful ‚Äî not filler content. 

‚ë° Environment & Map Expansion Next comes the playable environment. Each map unlock includes: Grid + gridless versions Printable and VTT-ready formats Modular terrain pieces where applicable Environmental hazards and puzzle hooks Ambient exploration music Combat soundtrack layers A narrated introduction to set the scene This transforms the encounter from a fight into a full experience. 

‚ë¢ Faction Expansion The final unlock of each arc introduces a full faction tied to that region‚Äôs story. These typically include: Around 10 STL miniatures (minions, elites, leaders) Tokens and stat cards, Lore chapters expanding the world, Unique faction mechanic,s Encounter packs or quest hooks Story integration with the Crimson Elixir narrative These factions become part of the expanding canon. 

The Story Progression Stretch goals follow a deliberate narrative path: Sanctum ruins, Ritual ground,s Fortress strongholds, Dimensional rifts, War-torn wasteland,s Celestial citadels, Shadow courts, Astral anomalies, Temporal vaults, Reality-breaking nexus zone.s Each arc deepens the mythology while remaining modular for gameplay.

Original Soundtrack Integration Every major arc includes: Ambient exploration tracks, Combat encounter music, Unique boss theme,s Narrative introduction voiceover.s This is designed to enhance immersion whether playing digitally or at a physical table.

The base campaign, when fully canonized and locked, already delivers a complete experience. Stretch goals expand the world ‚Äî they don‚Äôt ‚Äúfix‚Äù missing pieces. That means: No core gameplay locked behind stretch goals, no artificial padding, no forced upsells, just genuine expansion.

If the campaign reaches its highest tier, the digital experience evolves into a full cinematic module featuring: A branching finale to the Crimson Elixir story A god-tier final encounter Expanded lore codex Full original soundtrack suite Advanced VTT module integration Creator archive materials All digital. No fulfillment risk. Maximum creative output

The visual direction is established, a large portion of the miniatures and renders are complete or underway, the encounter system is designed, and the overall campaign structure is fully planned. This greatly reduces the risks typically associated with early-stage Kickstarter projects.

The Crimson Elixir is designed as a digital-first evolving campaign. Rather than making you wait for everything at once, we are delivering content in structured phases so you can start playing, printing, and exploring the world almost immediately while the universe continues expanding.
This approach also allows community feedback to refine the final canon version of the game.
Here is exactly how delivery will work.
This first release is guaranteed and already in advanced production.
You will receive:
‚úÖ Funding goal STL miniatures (fully supported + unsupported versions)
‚úÖ Terrain STL assets related to the pilot episode encounter (fully supported + unsupported versions)
‚úÖ Initial stat blocks for gameplay for the Funding Goal Content
‚úÖ Printable and VTT-ready tokens for the Funding Goal Content
‚úÖ Automatically added to your gallery for access through MyMiniFactory digital delivery
‚úÖ Early soundtrack sample tracks in WAV format, 3-4 min samples. Some will be extended and may still be revised in the final canon version.
‚úÖ Core encounter materials for the ‚Äúpilot episode‚Äù arc

Feedback cycles will run every two weeks. Stat balance may evolve based on real gameplay. Art polish and formatting adjustments may occur. Audio mastering improvements may be added. VTT optimization continues in parallel. Nothing will be locked prematurely ‚Äî we want the strongest possible final canon version.

Each unlocked faction expands the world significantly. Every Arc includes: 10 STL minions + 1 boss miniature, a dedicated encounter map, Lore expansion tied to the main narrative timeline Original ambient music, combat music, and boss theme, narrative introduction audio, and printable/VTT encounter materials. These will be released monthly after the initial funding goal delivery, depending on how many stretch goals are unlocked. This keeps the experience alive and continuously expanding. We cannot say yet at this point how many Unlocked Stretch Goal Arcs will be released in a month, but it will not be fewer than one.

Soundtrack & Audio Delivery Audio content will roll out in two stages: 
Month 1: Sample tracks released with initial files. 
Months 2-6: Final mastered soundtrack for all unlocked arcs, Ambient exploration tracks, Encounter combat music, Unique boss theme,s Narrative intro voiceovers. All backers eligible for audio rewards receive the full collection.

VTT Assets & Gameplay Systems
Month 1: Core stat blocks, Printable/VTT tokens. Initial encounter support.
Month 2: Full DM guide (digital), Encounter cheat sheets, Environmental rule sheets, Printable handouts. VTT compatibility includes: Foundry VTT, Roll20. Alchemy Stat refinement continues until canonization.

Six months after the campaign concludes, we officially lock: Final stat balance, Lore continuity, Audio mastering, Visual art polis,h Encounter structure VTT optimization, PDF guidebook final version. This marks the official canon release of Act 1. Think of this Kickstarter as the pilot arc that establishes the foundation for future expansions.

Future Content Direction
This campaign focuses on the main narrative spine: Core factions, Primary encounters, Essential lore development, Side quests, additional arcs, and deeper narrative branches are planned for future expansions once this foundation is fully established.

Why This Approach Benefits Backers, Instead of waiting many months for a single drop: Because in this structure, you get playable content quickly. The world grows continuously. Your feedback shapes the final version. As much as possible, even though we can do it internally as a team, we want the people to contribute and have a say on the final output. Quality improves organically. Delivery risk stays low. It‚Äôs a living campaign ‚Äî not a static release.
VTT Compatibility & Hybrid Tools

Assets are being prepared for Foundry VTT, Roll20, and Alchemy compatibility. While these platforms are well understood, formatting, packaging, and testing across multiple environments can require additional polishing time. We prioritize usability and stability over rushing technical releases.
Printable STLs for hybrid groups. Dynamic lighting, transparent tokens, condition markers, grid + gridless versions included.

This encounter module is designed to integrate smoothly with traditional 5E-style fantasy tabletop gameplay.
All included stat blocks, encounters, and narrative hooks are structured so they can work naturally alongside familiar character archetypes such as:

No major rule conversion is required ‚Äî you can drop the encounter directly into an existing campaign or run it as a standalone cinematic experience. DMs are free to adapt details to their table as needed.

Long before the first empires carved their borders and before written history claimed authority over truth, there existed a civilization now known only through fractured legend ‚Äî the Atlantean Ascendants. They did not conquer through armies or engines. They shaped existence through symbols, resonance, and an understanding of reality that modern minds would struggle to grasp. Their cities were instruments of power. White stone temples aligned to the heavens, corridors etched with sigils that hummed softly when walked upon, pillars that acted as anchors against forces unseen. Geometry was not decoration ‚Äî it was technology. Language was not merely spoken ‚Äî it was encoded into matter itself. Through these methods, they learned to stabilize energies that lay just beyond ordinary perception, energies ancient even then. For a time, their mastery seemed absolute. Their world prospered in a quiet brilliance that bordered on the sacred. Yet the deeper they looked into the fabric of existence, the more they began to sense that something vast was looking back. And still‚Ä¶ they continued.

Their greatest endeavor was not born of war or fear, but of ambition ‚Äî a longing to transcend the fragile limits of mortality. From decades of research into alchemy, cosmic resonance, and sigil harmonics came the creation of the Crimson Elixir: a living medium said to bridge flesh and eternity. It shimmered with a beauty that unsettled even its creators, like liquid starlight laced with something darker. The Ascendants believed it could heal divine wounds, expand consciousness, and allow a chosen vessel to step beyond humanity without losing it. Mirelle was chosen. Brilliant. Attuned. Revered by many, quietly feared by others. Whether she volunteered out of hope, duty, or something more private remains debated in the fragments of surviving lore. What is known is that she entered the Inner Sanctum willingly ‚Äî the most sacred convergence point of Atlantean architecture ‚Äî where the final ascension ritual began. For a moment, everything aligned perfectly. Then reality began to resist.

Witness accounts, though incomplete, describe a sudden stillness before the collapse ‚Äî as if the world itself held its breath. No one knows why the sigils that had stabilized Atlantis for generations faltered. Energy surged without harmony. Structures meant to anchor dimensional forces began to fracture from within. The Inner Sanctum sealed itself instinctively, an automatic defense mechanism activated by forces far older than the Ascendants. Entire districts vanished without a sound. Guardians awakened, not to protect the people, but to contain what had been unleashed. Mirelle did not die. But neither did she remain wholly human. The Crimson Elixir fused with her in a way no one had predicted, binding her to something vast, patient, and profoundly alien. She became a living anomaly ‚Äî a nexus where reality bends, memory distorts, and time seems uncertain. Atlantis fell from history soon after. Survivors scattered. Records faded. Myths replaced memory. Yet the Sanctum never truly slept. It waited. And now, the seals are weakening after thousands of years - waiting for the right people to reactivate them.

The Inner Sanctum is only the beginning. Future arcs will explore: Other Atlantean ruins, Hidden factions and guardians, The deeper truth behind the Crimson Elixir And what Mirelle‚Äôs awakening truly means for the world. Some answers may illuminate. Others may raise questions far more unsettling.
Why This Project Exists ‚Äì And Why Back Now

Many of us grew up imagining worlds, telling stories, and playing games where imagination had no ceiling. That spark doesn‚Äôt disappear with adulthood ‚Äî it just evolves. This project exists to honor that sense of wonder while delivering a more mature, cinematic experience for today‚Äôs tabletop community. Because imagination should never be something we outgrow. Especially when there are still mysteries left beneath the waves.
This campaign is designed as a pilot launch for a much larger world. Early support doesn‚Äôt just fund assets ‚Äî it determines how far the Crimson Elixir universe expands.

Unlock More Content Faster. Every pledge directly accelerates: New factions, Additional maps, More bosses, Expanded lore arcs, Extra VTT integrations, Original soundtrack releases. The sooner momentum builds, the faster new content appears.

Backers aren‚Äôt passive customers here. You‚Äôll influence: Balance decisions, Encounter flow refinements, Narrative emphasis, Environmental interaction ideas, and Optional future expansions. Your feedback becomes part of the system.

Early Support Advantages Early backers typically receive: Exclusive bonuses or cosmetic variants, Priority access to updates, First entry into future expansions, Recognition inside the project universe. Early momentum also signals confidence to new backers, which helps the campaign grow faster.

Momentum Matters when this Kickstarter campaign thrives on:
Strong opening days, Consistent mid-campaign activity, a powerful final push. So, backing early helps maintain that wave. And that wave unlocks more worlds for everyone.

Many of us grew up imagining worlds, telling stories, and playing games where imagination had no ceiling. That spark doesn‚Äôt disappear with adulthood ‚Äî it just evolves. This project exists to honor that sense of wonder while delivering a more mature, cinematic experience for today‚Äôs tabletop community. Because imagination should never be something we outgrow. Especially when there are still mysteries left beneath the waves

project.name: Monet Magic - building cultural bridges
project.description: Monet Magic - a feel good mixed-media workshop for everyone - spreading a message of hope, beauty and positivity

creator.name: Philip Potter
creator.biography: Born in Scarborough, North Yorkshire, England. Studied art and design at degree level in York, UK. Exhibited all over the world. Lived and worked as a practicing artist in Prague, Czech Republic, Espoo in Finland and Jakarta, Indonesia. Taught art iGCSE in Indonesia at international school. Started Monet Magic in 2018. Have partnered with Carers Resource and Yorkshire in Business. Personal work is on commission only basis. I also write books under the pen name Tom Halliday.

texte: Monet Magic:

I am raising funds for the purpose of skill sharing and cross cultural bridge building. I want to give away art materials to local Thai people and teach them how to use the materials for free. Ultimately, I want to promote a different kind of tourism by creating a Mecca for artists, which attracts artists from all over the world. I want to help the best practitioners from amongst my students to use their new skills to create fabulous art with a local theme and to teach others by putting on their own workshops. My name is Philip Potter. I am an artist. I am a teacher. I am a writer. And I have severe ET, a neurological disability similar to Parkinson‚Äôs disease. So, if I can do it, anyone can. 

The starting point is the island of Phuket, Thailand. I have been offered a venue there to put on workshops and start an art club. I am hopeful that the project will become self-sustaining in approximately 12 months. To pay for the venue, I will teach art classes to the kindergarten pupils at my friend‚Äôs school as a way to pay her back for allowing me to use the school after the pupils have gone home. I intend to run art classes for the growing expatriate community - Thailand has been very proactive in making a welcoming environment for retired western people with easy access to long term visas etc. and an art class is a good way to meet new people and reduce isolation. I will also offer art workshops to visiting tourists who come from all over the world - people who want to experience something new. Once developed, these potential income streams will allow me to offer free art materials and art classes to local Thai people, building a bridge between all three communities. I intend to do this using Claude Monet landscapes aka Monet Magic. There is a strong historical connection between French Impressionism and Thailand, which became popular there in the mid twentieth century.

The Monet Magic idea was developed while teaching in Indonesia - I needed a method that produced quick wins as well as a lasting sense of achievement. This technique works in all areas, from private one-to-one lessons to corporate well-being workshops. It turns ‚Äòcan‚Äôt do‚Äô staff into ‚Äòcan do‚Äô staff and it tackles the reluctant artist‚Äôs fear of facing a blank piece of paper. Any problem can be solved with the right approach, the right tools and the right techniques. I can teach anyone to replicate a Monet landscape in 2-3 hours using a step-by-step mixed media approach. The resulting paintings leave the participants both amazed and excited over what they have achieved. 

Being able to visually interpret the world around you and the world inside you is a ticket to better mental health and well-being as well as a saleable skill. Using your brain in a variety of ways can help in every area of life, leading to higher level thinking and more robust levels of concentration. This technique releases gamma waves in the brain in the same way solving a complex maths problem leads to a eureka moment - but without the maths. Monet is just the vehicle for the technique - once you have mastered the process you will be ready to create your own masterpieces quickly and confidently.

In a class, everyone paints the same picture. You will be taken through a step-by-step process. Everything is explained and demonstrated, so whether you learn better visually or through instruction your needs are catered for and as I show you what to do there is no language barrier. The painting is broken down into its constituent elements and rebuilt from the ground up. The class ends when the participant‚Äôs painting looks as near as possible a twin to the original. The process takes approximately 3 hours. It works like magic.

project.name: The 30-Year Fire: Scaling the Dream of DYRPottery
project.description: Reclaiming a 30-year dream. Help me fund and install a professional kiln to grow my studio beyond the basics and bring my soulful stone

creator.name: DYRPottery
creator.biography: I'm Devra of DYRPottery. After 28 years away from the wheel to focus on family, I‚Äôm reclaiming a dream that started in high school. I traded boring, commercial dishes for soulful, handmade stoneware. This project is my "second act"‚Äîthank you for helping me bring it to life!

texte: My story with clay began in a high school ceramics classroom exactly 28 years ago. I fell in love with the tactile, transformative nature of the medium, but as life often does, it called me in a different direction. I set that dream aside to focus on being a mother and a wife, dedicating years to building a family and a home. The clay was gone from my hands, but the artist inside was simply waiting.

Ten years ago, life shifted. Following a divorce and a beautiful new marriage, my husband and I were shopping for the everyday items to furnish our new home together. I found myself deeply dissatisfied with the commercial mugs, bowls, and plates we were finding. They felt soulless and lacked character.

When I told my husband that these pieces were boring and that I believed I could do better, he didn't just nod‚Äîhe gave me the push I needed. He asked why I wasn't creating, and he encouraged me to pick up the practice again.
I returned to the studio a decade ago and haven‚Äôt looked back. Today, DYRPottery is the realization of a dream that has been in my heart for nearly three decades.

My work is a celebration of the human touch. I choose not to use a pottery wheel; instead, I focus on the rhythmic, intentional methods of slabs, coils, and pinch posts. This process allows me to build a piece from the ground up, feeling the character of the clay in every seam and texture. By hand-building, I ensure that every mug, bowl, and plate has its own unique silhouette. When you hold a piece of DYRPottery, you are holding a piece of a story‚Äîone that is "perfectly imperfect" and entirely handmade.
I have been creating and selling pieces to friends and family, but to truly bring my work to the public and scale my studio, I need to "bring the fire" home.
I am fundraising to purchase and install a professional-grade kiln, including the necessary 240V electrical work and specialized ventilation.
Having a kiln in my own studio is the final step in this 28-year journey. It allows me to:
Carefully manage the delicate drying and firing cycles required for hand-built work
Experiment with glaze combinations.
Apply high-end finishes like 22K Gold, Silver, and Mother of Pearl lusters.
Meet the growing demand for my work and finally move my dream into the public eye.

By backing this project, you aren't just buying a dish. You are helping me realize a dream that has been waiting in the wings since high school. Every piece sent out as a reward will be hand-built by me and fired in the very kiln you helped install.
Thank you for helping me bring the fire back to my studio and for being a part of this second act.
All images here are my original art and examples of my recent past work.

Each mug is slowly hand-constructed using slabs, bearing the subtle marks of the maker's hands. No two are identical. Finished in a "Surprise Signature Glaze" from my personal studio palette‚Äîlet the kiln choose the perfect finish for you!

Includes: (1) Hand-built Mug + A handwritten thank-you note.

project.name: HELLRAISER: Leviathan's Vault
project.description: More than a collection, HELLRAISER: LEVIATHAN'S VAULT is a chronicle of damnation.

creator.name: BOOM! Studios
creator.biography: BOOM! Studios, part of the Random House Worlds portfolio of imprints at The Random House Publishing Group, a division of Penguin Random House, is the home of world-class comic book and graphic novel storytelling for all audiences. Through four distinct imprints‚ÄîBOOM! Studios, BOOM! Box, KaBOOM!, and Archaia‚Äî the team has produced bestselling, award-winning original work, including Keanu Reeves' BRZRKR, Something is Killing the Children, and Lumberjanes, while also breaking new ground with established licenses such as Mighty Morphin Power Rangers, Dune, and The Expanse properties. BOOM! original series have been brought to life in media, including the feature film The Empty Man (20th Century Studios), the animated series Mech Cadets (Netflix), and most recently, the live-action series Butterfly (Prime Video).

texte: Do you dare to open the Lament Configuration?

Give in to temptation and come on a skin-crawling trip to Hell with HELLRAISER: LEVIATHAN'S VAULT. On the 40th anniversary of The Hellbound Heart, Clive Barker‚Äôs original source material for the Hellraiser film franchise, Pinhead returns to wreak havoc on the human realm. Whether you fall into his grasp and become part of his Cenobite army or successfully escape your brush with death is all dependent on your smarts and grit. Good luck‚Äîyou‚Äôll need it.

HELLRAISER: LEVIATHAN'S VAULT collects the entirety of BOOM!‚Äôs long-out-of-print Hellraiser comics, along with a special volume featuring select fan-favorite stories from Marvel‚Äôs classic run of Hellraiser comics, all in deluxe hardcover editions!

Beware: this is no ordinary collection. It stands as a celebration of a legacy: a testament to a world that continues to evolve, provoke, and seduce, forty years after it first invited us to open the box.

HELLRAISER: LEVIATHAN'S VAULT is an archival descent into forbidden knowledge‚Äîmeticulously restored, curated, and presented for those willing to go further than the casual reader. Across multiple premium formats, this campaign offers collectors the chance to possess the Hellraiser comics in editions worthy of Leviathan.

From sleek deluxe hardcovers in tar-black or blood-red, to slipcased editions designed to feel less like books and more like relics, every version of Leviathan‚Äôs Vault has been crafted with reverence for Barker‚Äôs world of pain, pleasure, and dark transcendence.
Whether you seek knowledge, power, or exquisite suffering, Leviathan‚Äôs Vault offers a path forward.

Clive Barker is a legendary horror writer, director, and artist. He is best known for writing and directing the Hellraiser films and imbedding his iconic character, Pinhead, into the fabric of pop culture history. Other films of his include Lord of Illusions and Nightbreed, and though adapted by a different director, 1992‚Äôs Candyman was based on Barker‚Äôs short story, ‚ÄúThe Forbidden‚Äù. Barker is also a best-selling, award-winning author of many novels, which include: The Hellbound Heart, The Damnation Game, Weaveworld, Imajica, Sacrament, and the Abarat series.

The suffering doesn‚Äôt end with the books. As the campaign crosses new thresholds, we‚Äôll unlock truly unspeakable stretch goals‚Äîexclusive Hellraiser offerings you won‚Äôt find anywhere else. From meticulously crafted collectibles to infernal add-ons worthy of the Leviathan itself, each unlocked goal reveals new pleasures waiting beyond the veil. All unlocked items will be available as add-ons, allowing you to choose, combine, and curate a collection as exquisite‚Äîand as damned‚Äîas you desire.

After the campaign ends, your shipping will be calculated based on your reward(s) and shipping address. Shipping fees are not included in the reward costs listed on the campaign page. Rather, all shipping will be charged after the campaign ends through BackerKit.

BackerKit is a pledge management service that allows us to smoothly send out surveys, administer add-ons and late orders, charge for accurate shipping and applicable sales taxes, and track fulfillment. It also allows us to charge the most accurate and lowest possible shipping fees based on your total order and geographic location. You can find more information on BackerKit HERE.

As a reminder, the products offered in this BOOM! Direct Reserve campaign are exclusive variant covers and merchandise that will only be available through Kickstarter. Due to the production timelines of these variant covers, exclusive merchandise, and signed products, you will receive your rewards in the timeline mentioned above.

PLEASE BE ADVISED: While we partner with our fulfillment partners to minimize shipping costs in a number of ways, including utilizing overseas drop ship locations for our international customers, freight costs continue to fluctuate and rise due to numerous external factors. Please be sure to take the additional shipping costs into account when making the decision that is best for you.

Furthermore, should the number of individual items in your order necessitate it, BOOM! Studios reserves the right to split your order into multiple shipments. Again, this will help us balance keeping your shipping costs within a reasonable range and preventing any rare or limited-edition items from becoming damaged in transit.

Shipping fees are charged at the discretion of BOOM! Studios upon completion of surveys. BOOM! Studios will make its best effort to communicate in advance of shipping charges, however timing of charges being posted is subject to change from the estimate.

Please refer to the below chart for ESTIMATED shipping costs related to this campaign. The cost of shipping, due to fuel and other cost fluctuations, is currently very volatile. These are projections only and may change up or down once your order is ready to ship based on a variety of real-world factors. Once your survey through BackerKit is completed, we will be able to finalize your actual shipping costs.

Please note that Total Shipping costs reflect the total you will pay for shipping and handling for your reserved Tier and any unlocked Stretch Goals. Add-on items may increase your overall shipping costs. Additionally, during the survey period any U.S. and Canadian customers will be charged for any applicable sales tax based on your final order. For all other international orders, please note that while BOOM! Studios ships packages DDP (Delivery Duty Paid) your country may have additional VAT fees or customs duties which BOOM! Studios does not collect in advance. You will be 100% responsible for any of those fees should they be applied, and BOOM! Studios will not refund any international orders that are refused due to VAT or customs fees beyond our control.
At BOOM! Studios, we're passionate about helping longtime fans and new readers discover the characters, action, and emotion that make comics the greatest storytelling medium in the world.

We first entered Kickstarter in 2020 with BRZRKR‚Äîthe #1 bestselling comic book series by creator/writer Keanu Reeves, co-writer Matt Kindt, and artist Ron Garney‚Äîwith a record-setting campaign that redefined the metric of success for comic books and graphic novels on Kickstarter.

In doing so, we discovered something special: Kickstarter is the ideal platform to connect with fans discovering the magic of comic books for the first time, and to launch our most ambitious, limited-edition projects ever.

Enter: BOOM! Direct Reserve‚Äîour ongoing initiative designed to connect fans of our most celebrated franchises with comic books and graphic novels, including super-premium, specialty versions, and deliver them straight to your doorstep.

Every title we offer on Kickstarter under the BOOM! Direct Reserve program will be made available in a standard format through comic shops and bookstores, but fan-fueled campaigns like this are the only place to get the high-end, hyper-rare upgrades, exclusives, and extras truly worthy of top-shelf treatment.

We've done our best to answer many of the common questions asked on Kickstarter in the FAQ section of the campaign, which you can locate by clicking the "FAQ" tab. We encourage you to check it out first as it will be the fastest way to get answers to many of your pressing questions!
The best way to contact us is by emailing us directly at customerservice@boom-studios.com.
If you are having trouble contacting us via email, feel free to send us a message on this Kickstarter page and our team will be glad to lend a helping hand.
TO SEND A MESSAGE:

Near the top of this campaign page, under our video and to the right, you'll see BOOM! Studios. Click to "See More" and then on the link that says "Contact Me." Simply click this link and a pop-up will appear, allowing you to send us a message. You can also leave questions in the "Comments" tab.
SUPPORT HOURS OF OPERATION:
Monday ‚Äì Friday: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM Pacific
Saturday: Closed
Sunday: Closed
If you contact us while we're closed, we'll get back to you by the end of the next business day.
Thank you!

comments.text: I big part of me wants to upgrade the book to tier 6. But I am hesitating because I am not a fan of white books. I understand why they chose the design,  but it terrifies me to get them dirty.

replies.text: Same, I don‚Äôt think the price is worth a worse color choice and a signature.

I actually lean the opposite way, I really like the white books. To me, they resemble Pinhead‚Äôs pale skin, which makes them feel more thematic and tied to the Hellraiser aesthetic. I totally get the concern about them getting dirty though, especially at that price point. It‚Äôs definitely one of those ‚Äòdisplay vs. use‚Äô dilemmas.

I understand why they did the cover like that and it is nothing wrong with it. It is just a personal preference. Personally I would want the red books, but I also want the configuration box. So I am in a dilemma. As of right now the "rare colour" will be the red ones sense they have sold the least. I was even contemplating if I should spend the extra money to get the red ones and then sell the black ones but then I noticed that you can't get all the red with slipcases in the add on. So part of me are hoping they will add an colour choice option for teir 5. If they keep 6 as it is it might become more rare than what it is now.
